title: Security audit of native dependencies with skill optimization
body:
**Description of Change**

Audited 10 native dependencies against 2025-2026 CVE databases. Corrected initial findings via authoritative sources (NVD, Red Hat). Optimized security-audit skill to prevent future misclassifications.

**Findings:**

| Dependency | Status | Details |
|------------|--------|---------|
| libpng 1.6.44 | 🔴 Critical | 5 HIGH CVEs (buffer overflows) → Update to 1.6.54 required |
| freetype 2.13.3 | 🟡 Verify | CVE-2025-27363 affects ≤2.13.0 only per NVD/Red Hat. Likely not vulnerable. |
| libwebp | ✅ Resolved | PR #3478 merged during audit. Now at 1.6.0. |
| harfbuzz 8.3.1 | 🟡 Update | CVE-2026-22693/0943. PR #3232 available. |
| zlib | ⚪ False positive | CVE-2023-45853 affects MiniZip only (not compiled) |
| Others | 🟢 Clean | expat, brotli, libjpeg-turbo, dng_sdk |

**Corrections Made:**

Initial assessment reported freetype CVE-2025-27363 as CRITICAL affecting 2.13.3 based on security blogs. NVD and Red Hat confirm vulnerability limited to ≤2.13.0. SkiaSharp's 2.13.3 not vulnerable.

**Skill Optimization:**

Restructured `.github/skills/security-audit/` per skill-creator principles:
- Moved examples from SKILL.md to checklist (SKILL.md: 183→127 lines, -31%)
- Established source hierarchy: NVD/Red Hat → OpenCVE → blogs
- Required checking closed PRs (last 30 days) to detect merged work
- Eliminated duplication (~40% → 0%)
- Progressive disclosure: Overview in SKILL.md, examples in checklist

**Deliverables:**

Audit reports:
- `SECURITY-AUDIT-2026-01-31.md` - Full CVE analysis with risk assessments
- `SECURITY-AUDIT-SUMMARY.md` - Executive summary with action items
- `AUDIT-CORRECTIONS-2026-01-31.md` - Documents corrections with evidence tables

Skill improvements:
- `.github/skills/security-audit/SKILL.md` - Workflow overview (optimized)
- `.github/skills/security-audit/references/best-practices-checklist.md` - Execution checklist with examples
- `documentation/dependencies.md` - Added security audit best practices

**Bugs Fixed**

None. Documentation only.

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**Required skia PR**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (N/A - documentation only)
- [x] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [x] Merged related skia PRs (N/A)
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [x] Updated documentation
